author: Kevin Bruny
text: The Center for Organizational Excellence of Chesterfield County, Virginia is seeking a case study to use as part of its Emerging Senior Leaders Program.  This case is sought to provide leaders a culminating experience to apply concepts and theories learned during the past year.  We are seeking a case framework in which to build the specifics for a leader who is aspiring to become a department director.  If your organization has such a case and would be willing to share, it would be greatly appreciated.  Otherwise, we will need to write our own for this application experiences.
title: Seeking Director Level Case Study
